alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 9:57PM CDT until October 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 1 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow totals represent what will fall. Actual snowfall accumulations on the ground will depend on how much snow melts and compacts as it falls.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Red Lake; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk
